name: Behind Walls
description: Behind Walls is a small, short game that focuses on the storyline, the player will reveal the truth of this world. The main idea of this game came from presentable liberty, and many similar features can be found throughout the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 32/64 bit Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) CPU @ 2.20GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: intel 515 i5 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: directX 9.0c
